source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2016 for Beginners: Master the Essentials
items.headline: Learn the essentials of Microsoft Excel  2016 in easy to follow steps
objectives_summary: Discover new and improved features in Excel 2016.
How to effectively use Excel 2016 on a touchscreen device.
How create, save, and open a workbook.

items.title: No Nonsense Excel Pivot Tables Pro Course
items.headline: With real Companies examples learn the best tricks of Excel Pivot Tables in Just 1 Hour. Improve Decision Making Skills.
objectives_summary: Format the data for better pivot tables
Analyze the same data from different perspectives
Create Dynamic Charts

items.title: Excel for Beginners
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of Excel!
objectives_summary: Develop a proficiency in Microsoft Excel. You will be able to understand comprehensively how Microsoft Excel works, while being exposed to the kind of functionalities it allows you to execute. You will hopefully no longer fear working with a spreadsheet again!

items.title: Eye-catching presentations using PowerPoint 2010
items.headline: Improve your presentation skills and learn to effectively use PowerPoint 2010 to create eye-catching presentations.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to deliver an eye-catching presentation using Microsoft PowerPoint 2010.
You will know how to prepare a successful presentation by gathering and refining information
You will know how to create an outline for your presentation in Microsoft PowerPoint 2010

items.title: Outlook 13/16/19 Like a Boss. The Complete Course.

visible_instructors.title: Brian Culp
visible_instructors.name: Brian
visible_instructors.job_title: 100k+ students • 3M+ student minutes • MS Certified Trainer

items.headline: 110 lessons, most under 5min. Transform email & time mgmt. FREE keyboard shortcut guide. (Also MOS 77-423 prep.)
objectives_summary: You will set up your personal and work Inboxes
Quickly create new contacts and tasks from existing emails
Customize Outlook to work with your personal organizational style

items.title: Pivot Tables, Power Pivot Tables, Power Query & Power BI
items.headline: 5 Course Excel Bundle: Microsoft Excel, Pivot Tables, Power Pivot Tables, Power Query & Power BI (Excel 2007-2019, O365)
objectives_summary: Become more PRODUCTIVE at using Microsoft Excel which will SAVE YOU HOURS per day & ELIMINATE STRESS at work!
We teach you how to use Microsoft Excel with CONFIDENCE that will lead to greater opportunities like a HIGHER SALARY and PROMOTIONS!
Increase your Microsoft Excel SKILLS and KNOWLEDGE within HOURS which will GET YOU NOTICED by Top Management & prospective Employers!

items.title: Excel Deep Dive: Pivot Tables Workshop
items.headline: Excel data mastery is possible! Learn how to use pivot tables in excel and learn how to use pivot tables to get a raise
objectives_summary: Master Excel Pivot Tables
Learn to Harness these skills to get a raise
Solve World Hunger

items.title: Ultimate Guide to Microsoft PowerPoint for All Levels
items.headline: If you need to up-skill for your job or looking to land one, then this PowerPoint training will get you there!
objectives_summary: Complete startup and design of a presentation in the first section so you can use it immediately
Design Themes
AutoSaving Features for Safeguarding

items.title: Master Excel Functions in Office 365 - Excel Dynamic Arrays
items.headline: Learn to Use Excel's NEW Functions (FILTER, UNIQUE, SORT, XLOOKUP...) to Dramatically Simplify the Work You Do in Excel.
objectives_summary: Master Excel's NEW Formulas (FILTER, UNIQUE, XLOOKUP, SORT, SORTBY, SEQUENCE, RANDARRAY & More Dynamic Array Functions)
Learn how to think outside the box to solve ANY Excel challenge you come across
Be the FIRST to unlock the power of Microsoft Excel’s BRAND-NEW calculation engine

items.title: Visual Basic for Excel - Microsoft VBA Excel Tutorial
items.headline: Master Visual Basic for Excel, learn to unlock the true power of Excel. Tutorial Taught by a leading Microsoft Expert

items.headline: Learn the essential as well as the advanced features in Microsoft Word 2013 in an easy and compelling way.
objectives_summary: Make an efficient use of MS word software saving a lot of time as well as getting well versed with one of the most widely used software.

items.title: Microsoft 365 SharePoint Sites
items.headline: Understand Sites, navigation, libraries, searching, views, permissions, and organization of Microsoft 365 Sites.
objectives_summary: Understand Sites and Libraries
Create and Share a Site
Create site structure by adding apps

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2016 Master Class: Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Quickly learn how use Excel 2016 the right way and make your life easier and more productive in our complete course!
objectives_summary: Understand how Excel works and the most efficient way to do most tasks.
Understand worksheet basics and learn keyboard shortcuts
Learn how to manipulate columns and rows
